column4: ^ I can't find the file libnpjp2.so. I thought that's what it was called...
I installed sun-java6-plugin, but I can't find the .so file to copy/link into Opera's plugin directory.
aww I don't want to do it manually, Quantum_Ion... lol
it should work fine installed by a package I just can't find the plugin file.
actually the JRE works fine, I just need the plugin.
java -version recognizes Sun Java the way I did it (installing from the ppa ppa:sun-java-community-team/sun-java)
except Quantum_Ion, I only want Java 6, and the JRE alone for now
well locate libnpjp2.so brought up nothing, but I'll check
well that assumes I installed Java 7, and manualy at that
I installed Java 6 via apt-get. I just can't find the plugin.
a lot of permission denied errors...
Never mind, got it, thanks Quantum_Ion.
yeah, find isn't the ideal way to get to your file
